TopicTitle: Is it possible to activate physical timewarp in space?

Articles.Content:
well is it? I've been wondering since day one

idk if there is a button for it, but I haven't been able to find it as of far
Alt + < and Alt + > not working for you in space KAO?
ah well no wonder I didn't find it, it's a button combination. Thanks!

Physical warp does not put the ship on-rails, but it also decreases the simulation accuracy. This means that in some cases, it can cause a lot of problems (breaking up of ships, etc) where there would otherwise be none. Usually it's okay, though.
